casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Tilmon Charles GOLPHIN 441A98-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 17, 2017 Jay H. Ferguson, Attorney at Law, Kenneth J. Rose, Attorney at Law, Durham, for Golphin, Tilmon Charles. Danielle Marquis Elder, Special Deputy Attorney General, Jonathan P. Babb, Special Counsel to Attorney General, William R. West, District Attorney, for State of N.C. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th of March 2017 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Petition for Writ of Certiorari: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of March 2017." Beasley, J. recused
